comment.body:
Some output of `cat /dev/urandom | base64 | grep Bcash` command here:

````
xBe1SmLvyFdHFIriTKwcLAdYRBjzaIlAm3JHAmfUmyLDfkH8CQg2BBPRSzWHwDBcashTFsnghBlX
ndro851ABt5M5kQ0irO068Q/VN1Q1wRkI1e+OVqapJbtBcashyfRgCtaYAFRe0jZwspYouDe/Lk4
5izC9mnxa918Eqjxojk1xbrPIDjiMLug5UjM4cBcash27VJLFqcjo9ad6eKiimgptXopFaxNzMCR

````

Put a mouse pointer to the left site of the post text and you will see edit button.   


But there is an option to hide "Hello ZeroMe" posts. Actually, it hides a first from the start post. If you delete your "Hello ZeroMe!" post, it will hide your second post.
